My Lab Notebook

I like the idea of open notebook science, so this is my attempt at it.

I will periodically upload simple models and simulations here: nbviewer directory. Entries are organized by date, and each file should be self-contained with code and explanatory notes.

I will also periodically sketch out my projects/thoughts in a lab diary, which you can find in this nbviewer directory. This may be less useful and will definitely be less polished than the code posted to the first link, above.
